about_the_game:
Whispers in the Wood is a single-player base defense strategy game that combines resource management, unit deployment, and survival mechanics in a cursed forest. As the commander, you must lead your team to build, upgrade, and defend your base against the relentless onslaught of demonic creatures each night.

Key Features:

  • Build and Expand Your Base: Construct walls, towers, and essential structures to strengthen your defenses. Build specialized houses to unlock new abilities for your soldiers and improve resource collection efficiency. Upgrading these buildings is key to surviving the increasingly dangerous attacks.

  • Strategic Resource Management and Command Units: Recruit and deploy soldiers to defend your base. Build specialized buildings to grant your troops new abilities, making them more effective in battle or resource gathering. Deploy your units wisely to ensure your base is well-stocked and prepared for day and night challenges.

  • Daytime Exploration and Nighttime Terror: During the day, venture beyond the safety of your base to explore and discover new opportunities. Prepare for intense battles at night as waves of demonic creatures with unique abilities attack your base. Each night brings new surprises and escalating dangers.

  • Dynamic Lighting System: Experience the beauty and danger of the cursed forest with an advanced lighting system. During the night, the forest transforms into a mesmerizing yet terrifying scene with diverse light sources—torches, magic lights, and eerie glows—that both aid and challenge your survival.

Your Mission:

Survive as long as you can in the cursed forest. You can either endure the relentless attacks for 30 days until help arrives or strike back by finding and destroying the heart of the enemy base. The choice is yours.
